RelatedSentence: BRATISLAVA May 19 ( Reuters ) - A pipeline to transport gas to Ukraine via Slovakia should be ready for pumping at full capacity starting in September , the head of Slovakia 's pipeline operator said , which would help provide some gas if Russia cuts supplies .

BRATISLAVA May 19 ( Reuters ) - A pipeline to transport gas to Ukraine via Slovakia should be ready for pumping at full capacity starting in September , the head of Slovakia 's pipeline operator said , which would help provide some gas if Russia cuts supplies .
